code: import moment from'moment';export var stringToDate=function stringToDate(_date,_format){return moment(_date).format(_format);};export var stringToaddDate=function stringToaddDate(_date,_format){var add=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:{qtd:1,period:'M'};return moment(_date).add(add.qtd,add.period).format(_format);};export var formatToBRL=function formatToBRL(_valor){_valor=_valor+'';_valor=parseInt(_valor.replace(/[\D]+/g,''));_valor=_valor+'';_valor=_valor.replace(/([0-9]{2})$/g,",$1");if(_valor.length>6){_valor=_valor.replace(/([0-9]{3}),([0-9]{2}$)/g,".$1,$2");}return _valor;};export var checkImageUrl=function checkImageUrl(imageUrl){var img=new Image();img.src=imageUrl;if(img.height>0){return true;}else{return false;}};export function validaEmail(email){var emailCheck=/^([a-z]){1,}([a-z0-9._-]){1,}([@]){1}([a-z]){2,}([.]){1}([a-z]){2,}([.]?){1}([a-z]?){2,}$/i;return emailCheck.test(email);}export function validaCpf(){var strCPF=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"";strCPF=strCPF.replace(/[^\d]+/g,'');var Soma;var Resto;Soma=0;if(strCPF.length!=11||strCPF=="00000000000"||strCPF=="11111111111"||strCPF=="22222222222"||strCPF=="33333333333"||strCPF=="44444444444"||strCPF=="55555555555"||strCPF=="66666666666"||strCPF=="77777777777"||strCPF=="88888888888"||strCPF=="99999999999")return false;if(strCPF.length<11)return false;if(strCPF.length<11)return false;for(var i=1;i<=9;i++){Soma=Soma+parseInt(strCPF.substring(i-1,i))*(11-i);}Resto=Soma*10%11;if(Resto==10||Resto==11)Resto=0;if(Resto!=parseInt(strCPF.substring(9,10)))return false;Soma=0;for(var _i=1;_i<=10;_i++){Soma=Soma+parseInt(strCPF.substring(_i-1,_i))*(12-_i);};Resto=Soma*10%11;if(Resto==10||Resto==11)Resto=0;if(Resto!=parseInt(strCPF.substring(10,11)))return false;return true;}
